summary: Pizza is now a food in the game.  Chef Turtle in Riverwood has shared his secret of this seemingly modern food with you and sells his secret to the residents of Riverwood between 12pm - 8 pm. You have your base pizzas, and speciality pizzas each with different set of ingredient requirements for crafting.
descriptionHtml:
Pizza does not exist anywhere. Although it is deemed as a modern invention, Chef Turtle in Riverwood has opened up Riverwood Pizza and shared his secret with the Dovakhin. Between 12pm-8pm, he will sell pizza at Riverwood Pizza. Who knows how Chef Turtle found these secrets.

You can create your own depending on the ingredients and the type you want to make.

The types of pizza and the recipes:
Pizza - 2 tomatos, 1 bread, 1 cheese wedge, 1 salt pile
Dragonborn Lovers Pizza - Pizza ingredients, 1 beef, 1 goat meat, 1 pheasant, 1 rabbit, 1 venison
High Elf Special Pizza - Pizza ingredients, 1 Carrot, 1 Gourd, 1 Leek, 1 Juniper Berries
Horkers Special Pizza - Pizza ingredients, 1 Ale, 1 Cabbage, 1 Horker Meat, 1 Garlic, 1 Slaughterfish Egg
Ratway Special Pizza - Pizza ingredients, 1 Black Briar Mead, 1 Moon Sugar, 1 Skooma
Three Cheese Pizza - Pizza ingredients, 1 other cheese wedge, 1 mammoth cheese bowl

Now those who are in the wild and need something amazing for a meal, here are some options. Enjoy your pizza!

Changelog:
1.1:
-Fixed the navigation issues Delphine and other NPC were having through Riverwood.

Note: The screenshot with the adventurers does not have the adventurers included. Was using the Adventurers and Travelers mod when I took that screenshot.

[b][size=12]Will never use any invasive 3rd-party licensing add-ons.[/b][/size]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[u][size=5][b]Hearthfire Edition is here! (Requires Hearthfire)[/b][/size][/u]

The goal of Hearthfire Edition is to make a more realistic pizza baking experience, and utilize the expanded ingredients offered from Hearthfire.

With this Hearthfire edition, the ingredients have changed, and there are more types of pizza, and you use the Oven instead of the Cooking Pot now.  The original pizzas use flour instead of bread now.  Below are the new pizzas:

Potato Bread Pizza - Butter, Milk, Cheese Wedge (first type), Potato, Salt Pile, Tomato (x2)
Dragonborn Lovers Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 beef, 1 goat meat, 1 pheasant, 1 rabbit, 1 venison
High Elf Special Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Carrot, 1 Gourd, 1 Leek, 1 Juniper Berries
Horkers Special Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Ale, 1 Cabbage, 1 Horker Meat, 1 Garlic, 1 Slaughterfish Egg
Ratway Special Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Black Briar Mead, 1 Moon Sugar, 1 Skooma
Three Cheese Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 other cheese wedge, 1 mammoth cheese bowl

Garlic Bread Pizza - Butter, Flour, Cheese Wedge (first type), Garlic, Salt Pile, Tomato (x2)
Dragonborn Lovers Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 beef, 1 goat meat, 1 pheasant, 1 rabbit, 1 venison
High Elf Special Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Carrot, 1 Gourd, 1 Leek, 1 Juniper Berries
Horkers Special Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Ale, 1 Cabbage, 1 Horker Meat, 1 Garlic, 1 Slaughterfish Egg
Ratway Special Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Black Briar Mead, 1 Moon Sugar, 1 Skooma
Three Cheese Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 other cheese wedge, 1 mammoth cheese bowl


Khajiit Special Pizza - Fruity Sweet Tooth Special, Moon Sugar, Skooma
Fruity Sweet Tooth Special Pizza - Butter, Flour, Green Apple, Cheese Wedge (first type), JazBay, Juniper Berries, Salt Pile, Snowberry
[size=4]
Enjoy this more immersive version of Skyrim Pizza![/size]

[size=2]Changelog from Vanilla version to Hearthfire Edition:

-Chef Turtle uses an Oven (like you see in your Hearthfire homes) instead of a Smelter called an Oven.
-All Pizzas are baked from Ovens instead of cooked from Cooking Pots.
-All old Pizzas use Flour from Hearthfire instead of Bread now.
-Added new types of Pizza based on Hearthfire cooking ingredients:
Potato Bread Pizza - Butter, Milk, Cheese Wedge (first type), Potato, Salt Pile, Tomato (x2)
Dragonborn Lovers Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 beef, 1 goat meat, 1 pheasant, 1 rabbit, 1 venison
High Elf Special Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Carrot, 1 Gourd, 1 Leek, 1 Juniper Berries
Horkers Special Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Ale, 1 Cabbage, 1 Horker Meat, 1 Garlic, 1 Slaughterfish Egg
Ratway Special Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Black Briar Mead, 1 Moon Sugar, 1 Skooma
Three Cheese Potato Bread Pizza - Potato Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 other cheese wedge, 1 mammoth cheese bowl
Garlic Bread Pizza - Butter, Flour, Cheese Wedge (first type), Garlic, Salt Pile, Tomato (x2)
Dragonborn Lovers Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 beef, 1 goat meat, 1 pheasant, 1 rabbit, 1 venison
High Elf Special Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Carrot, 1 Gourd, 1 Leek, 1 Juniper Berries
Horkers Special Potato Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Ale, 1 Cabbage, 1 Horker Meat, 1 Garlic, 1 Slaughterfish Egg
Ratway Special Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 Black Briar Mead, 1 Moon Sugar, 1 Skooma
Three Cheese Garlic Bread Pizza - Garlic Bread Pizza ingredients, 1 other cheese wedge, 1 mammoth cheese bowl
-Added two new Pizzas based on Hearthfire cooking ingredients:
Khajiit Special Pizza - Fruity Sweet Tooth Special, Moon Sugar, Skooma
Fruity Sweet Tooth Special Pizza - Butter, Flour, Green Apple, Cheese Wedge (first type), JazBay, Juniper Berries, Salt Pile, Snowberry


[/size]Follow me on Facebook for updates: [url=https://www.facebook.com/ArronDominionProductions/]Arron Dominion Productions[/url]
